original_text: He said to Jacob ‘Quick, let me have some of that red food! I am very hungry.’ (That is why he was also called Edom.)
korean_text: 야곱에게 이르되 내가 피곤하니 그 붉은 것을 내가 먹게 하라 한지라 그러므로 에서의 별명은 에돔이더라

sentences.original_text: Quick, let me have some of that red food!
sentences.korean_translation: 어서, 그 붉은 음식을 좀 주게!

sentences.original_text: That is why he was also called Edom.
